input_data_format.description: Input data format to be converted.

GetDateTimePiece.name: GetDateTimePiece
GetDateTimePiece.description: A Piece that gets current system date and time.

use_timezone.description: Whether to use a timezone for the timestamp.
use_timezone.title: Use Timezone

date.description: Date of the timestamp, in ISO format.
date.title: Date

time.description: Time of the timestamp, in ISO format.
time.title: Time

datetime.description: Datetime of the timestamp, in ISO format.
datetime.title: Datetime

script.default:
# Do not modify the function definition line 
def custom_function(kwarg_1, kwarg_2):
    # Write your code here
    print(f"First argument: {kwarg_1}")
    print(f"Second argument: {kwarg_2}")

    # Return the output of the function as an object,
    # Matching the Output Args defined in the Form below
    return {
        "output_1": "this is a string", 
        "output_2": 420
    }
script.title: Script

SleepPiece.description: A Piece that executes a Python sleep function for a user-defined duration

SimpleLogPiece.description: A Piece that simply logs its input

ApiFetchPiece.name: ApiFetchPiece
ApiFetchPiece.description: This piece fetches data from an API

base64_bytes_data.description: Output data as base64 encoded string.

PromptCreatorForImageGeneratorPiece.name: PromptCreatorForImageGeneratorPiece

style.node_label: Prompt Creator for Image Generator AI

PromptCreatorForImageGeneratorPiece.description: This Piece utilizes OpenAI to generates a prompt to pass to an image generator AI.

context.description: The context to generate an image from
context.title: Context

art_style.default: You know many art styles, so you always vary a lot on your suggestions!
art_style.description: The art style to generate an image from. Your imagination is the limit!
art_style.title: Art Style

output_type.description: The type of output to return

openai_model.description: OpenAI model to bring your character to life

completion_max_tokens.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate the prompt.
completion_max_tokens.title: Completion Max Tokens

temperature.description: Temperature of the model, between 0 (more precise) and 1 (more creative)
temperature.title: Temperature

generated_prompt_string.description: The generated prompt to pass to an image generator AI
generated_prompt_string.title: Generated Prompt String

generated_prompt_file_path.description: The path to the generated prompt, in .txt format
generated_prompt_file_path.title: Generated Prompt File Path

TextGeneratorPiece.name: TextGeneratorPiece
TextGeneratorPiece.description: This Piece allows you to create a custom prompt with your own arguments and send it to OpenAI for text generation.

InnerArgModel.description: Inner argument model to use in the prompt args
InnerArgModel.title: InnerArgModel

OutputTypeType.description: Output type for the generated text
OutputTypeType.title: OutputTypeType

template.default: What is the capital city of {country}?
template.description: Compose a prompt template using the {arg_name} notation to insert arguments.
template.title: Template

prompt_args.description: List of arguments to insert into the prompt.
prompt_args.title: Prompt Args

output_type.description: The type of output to return.

completion_max_tokens.description: The maximum number of tokens in the generated text.
completion_max_tokens.title: Completion Max Tokens

temperature.description: Temperature of the model, between 0 (more precise) and 1 (more creative).
temperature.title: Temperature

string_generated_text.description: The generated text as a string
string_generated_text.title: String Generated Text

file_path_generated_text.description: The path to text file containing generated text
file_path_generated_text.title: File Path Generated Text

ImageGeneratorPiece.name: ImageGeneratorPiece
ImageGeneratorPiece.description: This Piece utilizes DALL-E, an OpenAI model that generates images based on a prompt.

OutputTypeType.description: Output type for the result text
OutputTypeType.title: OutputTypeType

prompt.description: A text description of the desired image
prompt.title: Prompt

size.description: The size of the generated images

image_format.description: The format in which the generated image is returned

output_type.description: The type of the output. Attention: if Response Format equals to image_png, then Output Type must be file type.

InformationExtractionPiece.description: Extracts user-defined information from the input text.

input_text.description: Source text from where information should be extracted.
input_text.title: Input Text

openai_model.description: OpenAI model name to use for information extraction.

extract_items.description: Information items to be extracted from source text.

TextSummarizerPiece.description: This Piece runs a text summarizer using OpenAI API.

text_file_path.description: Use it only if not using text field. File path to the text to summarize
text_file_path.title: Text File Path

output_type.description: The type of output to return

openai_model.description: OpenAI model name to use for summarization

chunk_size.description: Chunk size, measured in tokens, of each pre-summary chunk
chunk_size.title: Chunk Size

chunk_overlap_rate.description: The percentage of overlap between each chunk
chunk_overlap_rate.title: Chunk Overlap Rate

completion_max_tokens.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate in the summary.
completion_max_tokens.title: Completion Max Tokens

temperature.description: Temperature of the model, between 0 (more precise) and 1 (more creative)
temperature.title: Temperature

temperature.title: Temperature

string_transcription_result.description: The result transcription text as a string.
string_transcription_result.title: String Transcription Result

file_path_transcription_result.description: The result transcription text as a file path.
file_path_transcription_result.title: File Path Transcription Result

InnerArgModel.description: Inner argument model to use in the body and subject texts
InnerArgModel.title: InnerArgModel

email_receivers.description: The receivers of the email, as comma-separated values
email_receivers.title: Email Receivers

subject_args.description: List of arguments to insert into the subject of the email
subject_args.title: Subject Args

body_args.description: List of arguments to insert into the body of the email
body_args.title: Body Args

success.description: The result of the email sending task.
success.title: Success

NewsApiArticlesPiece.name: NewsApiArticlesPiece
NewsApiArticlesPiece.description:
This Piece uses the News API to retrieve full articles.
References:
- https://newsapi.org/
- https://newsapi.org/docs/endpoints/everything

language.description: Language to filter by. Options are: `ar`, `de`, `en`, `es`, `fr`, `he`, `it`, `nl`, `no`, `pt`, `ru`, `sv`, `ud`, `zh`.

publishedAt.description: Date article was published, in ISO format.
publishedAt.title: Publishedat

NewsApiHeadlinesPiece.name: NewsApiHeadlinesPiece
NewsApiHeadlinesPiece.description:
This Piece uses the News API to retrieve the top headlines from a given source or country.
References:
- https://newsapi.org/
- https://newsapi.org/docs/endpoints/top-headlines

category.description: Category to filter by. Options are: `business`, `entertainment`, `general`, `health`, `science`, `sports`, `technology`.

country.description: Country to filter by. Options are: `all`, `ae`, `ar`, `at`, `au`, `be`, `bg`, `br`, `ca`, `ch`, `cn`, `co`, `cu`, `cz`, `de`, `eg`, `fr`, `gb`, `gr`, `hk`, `hu`, `id`, `ie`, `il`, `in`, `it`, `jp`, `kr`, `lt`, `lv`, `ma`, `mx`, `my`, `ng`, `nl`, `no`, `nz`, `ph`, `pl`, `pt`, `ro`, `rs`, `ru`, `sa`, `se`, `sg`, `si`, `sk`, `th`, `tr`, `tw`, `ua`, `us`, `ve`, `za`.

language.description: Language to filter by. Options are: `ar`, `de`, `en`, `es`, `fr`, `he`, `it`, `nl`, `no`, `pt`, `ru`, `sv`, `ud`, `zh`.

publishedAt.description: Date article was published, in ISO format.
publishedAt.title: Publishedat
